question: 発掘
sourceMnemonic: Let's <kanji>departure</kanji> on our <kanji>dig</kanji>ging up of this site. It is more than just digging, we're going somewhere and learning new things with this dig. This is an <vocabulary>excavation</vocabulary>!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Be careful of the <ja>発</ja> getting shortened.
